wikipedia_page.main: Patrick John Field (born 19 March 1959) is a British Circuit judge.He was educated at Wilmslow County Grammar School and King's College London (LLB). He was called to the bar at Gray's Inn in 1981 and served as a Recorder from 2001 to 2012.

response: Patrick Field (born 6 June 1937) is a Hong Kong middle-distance runner. He competed in the men's 800 metres at the 1964 Summer Olympics.
